tool_description: Provides optimization recommendations to minimize food and product waste based on expiration patterns, usage history, and current inventory levels.

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization objective: minimize_waste, reduce_costs, maximize_freshness, balance_all

include_categories.description: Product categories to include in optimization

priority_products.description: Product IDs to prioritize in optimization

error_messages: Invalid optimization goal: Goal must be one of: minimize_waste, reduce_costs, maximize_freshness, balance_all.
Invalid time horizon: Time horizon must be between 7 and 180 days.
Invalid budget constraint: Budget constraint must be a positive number if provided.
usage: Specify optimization_goal to get targeted recommendations. Customize with time_horizon_days, include_categories, budget_constraint, and priority_products for specific optimization needs.

waste_reduction_potential.description: Estimated percentage reduction in waste if recommendations are followed

purchase_recommendations.description: Products recommended for purchase with quantities

consumption_suggestions.description: Products that should be consumed soon

cost_impact.description: Estimated cost savings from implementing recommendations
